title: Sales Manager Job at Huafei Trading Company Limited
content:

Job Position: Sales Manager
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibility


	To ensure the implementation of strategies and activities that would enhance the growth in sales of our food additive and brand.


Requirements

title: Sales / Business Development Executive Job at Human Edge Dimension Consulting
content:
Human Edge Dimension Consulting - Our client is an international logistics company providing services in Air cargo operations, Sea groupage, Clearing & Forwarding, Freight Forwarding amongst others.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales / Business Development Executive

Job Location: Marina - Lagos Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	They are seeking to employ a strategic and experienced sales  /  Business Development Executive to help attract the right clients and audience and convince them to use their services.


Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Analyze the Lagos market, identify new opportunities, and promote company services.
	Develop and maintain relationships with new and existing customers, identifying and fulfilling potential customer needs.
	Handle inquiries, provide competitive pricing, and negotiate to maximize company interests.
	Proactively resolve any issues during the transportation process to ensure client satisfaction.


Requirements


	A Bachelor’s Degree or HNDin Logistics, Marketing, International Trade, or a related field.
	4+ years of experience in freight forwarding, particularly in Sales, Business Development and ClientManagement.
	Strong understanding of freight forwarding processes, including foreign trade, transportation, and warehousing.
	Proven skills in sales development and customer relationship management in logistics.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and problem-solving skills, with a high level of self-motivation.


Remuneration & Benefits


	Bonus: Transportation allowance between N15,000 - N50,000.
	A competitive salary of N500,000/month.
	Paid time off, including vacation and sick leave.
	Work hours: 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM, Monday to Saturday.
	Regular team-building activities and an end-of-year gift.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV to: humanedgeconsulting02@gmail.com using "Sales / Business Development Executive" as the subject of the mail.

title: Female Receptionist / Front Desk Officer Job at Krystal Medical Centre
content:
Krystal Medical Centre is a leading healthcare facility located in Magodo Phase 2, Lagos, Nigeria. Renowned for its commitment to excellence in patient care, the centre offers a comprehensive range of medical services, including general consultations, specialist care, diagnostics, and preventive health services. With a team of experienced professionals and modern medical equipment, Krystal Medical Centre delivers quality, affordable, and accessible healthcare in a serene and secure environment.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Female Receptionist / Front Desk Officer

Job Location: Magodo Phase 2, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Provide a Positive First Impression: Ensure patients and visitors have a welcoming and positive experience.
	Maintain a Welcoming Environment: Keep the hospital environment calm, quiet, and inviting for patients and their families.
	Collect and Manage Patient Information: Gather patient details and update medical records accurately.
	Data Backup: Log daily registrations into Microsoft Excel for backup.
	Handle Telephone Communications: Answer calls with polite and consistent phone manners, adhering to proper telephone etiquette.
	Schedule Appointments: Organize and manage patient appointment schedules effectively.
	Coordinate Patient Flow: Facilitate and monitor the movement of patients within the hospital.
	Assist with Documentation: Help patients complete necessary forms and paperwork.
	Maintain a Clean Reception Area: Ensure the front desk and surrounding areas are tidy and orderly.
	Process Billing and Payments: Handle payment transactions and billing processes efficiently.
	Provide Comfort to Distressed Patients: Address appointment issues and offer emotional support during stressful situations or emergencies.
	Manage Social Media Accounts: Oversee and maintain the hospital’s social media presence.
	Ensure Confidentiality: Maintain strict confidentiality of patient and hospital information at all times.
	Generate Relevant Reports: Create and provide necessary reports as required.
	Stock Front Office Supplies: Keep the reception area well-stocked with essential stationery and consumables.
	Liaise with Departments: Communicate professionally and discreetly with all medical departments.


Qualifications


	OND/HND in Business Administration, Accounting or its equivalent.
	One to two years of working experience


Requirements / Skills:


	Proficient in Healthcare Management Systems and Microsoft Office Suite.
	Experience working in a hospital is an added advantage.
	Face-to-face experience with customers.
	Outstanding communication skills, both written and verbal.
	Excellent organizational and multitasking skills.
	Highly motivated team player, willing to go the extra mile.
	Must be presentable and smart.
	Attention to detail.
	Fast learner.
	Must be ready to resume immediately
	Must reside within Magodo, Ketu, Ikosi, Shangisha, Berger, Ikeja, or nearby areas.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their applications and copies of their credentials to: Krystalmedicalcentre@gmail.com with the Job Position applied for as the subject of the email.
